metadata.title: CVE-2022-2580 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Heap-based Buffer Overflow in GitHub repository vim/vim prior to 9.0.0102.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2580` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

vim - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11
vim-athena - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11
vim-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11
vim-gtk - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11
vim-gtk3 - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11
vim-gui-common - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11
vim-nox - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11
vim-runtime - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11
vim-tiny - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11
xxd - 2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: vim package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:8.2.3995-1ubuntu2.11').
